category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEConsiderFlowsOnReSequence
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default state of the Consider flows check box in the Re-sequence dialog box in Manufacturing Process Planner and Part Planner. After the first time you open the dialog box, the check box state is stored in a cookie. see Manufacturing Process Planner or the Part Planner. Valid Values: true - The Consider flows check box is selected. false - The Consider flows check box is cleared.
